snippet.title: Vampire Knight DS English Trailer
snippet.description:
A fully remastered version of the original trailer for the English patch. 

Find out more, and grab the download here: 
https://www.romhacking.net/translations/6369/

Fancy getting involved with our mission to bring out more awesome anime games in English? Join our Discord server at: https://discord.com/invite/UUF7Zbm 

Original trailer available here:
https://youtu.be/qw4xX9oB1sI
